column4: hello, i have a problem with my USB ADMTek 8511 Ethernet adaptor, everything looks greate but i cant get a IP Adress in my DHCP Network, anyone can help m e plz ?
so it does detect it but you cant get an ip
i see the ethernet card and the usb adaptor, i cant get an ip with dhcp
and i set up the ip that i get in win, it doent work
in a terminal run the command ifconfig
the prob is: that im in win, because i have no internet in linux :P
ifconfig -a i see eth0 (Ethernet card) , eth1 (USB-Ethernet) , eth2 (Wireless Card), lo and sit0
